name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: yllaR - Upside down view for Rally Teamboard

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A more condensed and usable UI changes for Rally Teamboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- For issues or feature additions email me: contact.skippercool@gmail.com

Rally Tips:
-----------------
- Three essential fields that could be useful. `Tags/Iteration/Plan Est`. To add fields, click `Show Fields` button which is located above the column headers.
- If your team is involved in pair programming, you could add the pair name as tags. Open a card, click on `+` under `Tags`. Add individual person's ID or their name. Add tags to each story, when pair starts working on it.
- Owner/Creator is disabled by default. If you would like to add this field to the card, click `Show Fields` -> select `Created By`.

Revisions:
-----------------
0.5:
- Updated `Plan Est` styles since Rally have changed css class names and styles.

0.4:
- Updated `Tags` styles since Rally have changed css class names and styles.
- Moved icons to the root since Chrome was not recognizing the icon path.

0.3:
- Reorganize files and reduce file size of the extension.
- Added Rally tips.

0.2:
  - Removed Owner tag after feedback from users. 
    (If you would like to add owners, click `Show Fields` -> select `Created By`)
  - Update application name
  
0.1:
 - Initial release
